import React from 'react' import Footer from './Footer' import UserLeft from './UserLeft' import {useState,useEffect} from 'react' function NutriSearch() { const[foodname,setFoodName]=useState('') const[food,setFood]=useState('') const [message, setMessage] = useState('') function handleform(e){ e.preventDefault(); const formData={foodname} fetch('/api/foodsearch',{ method:'POST', headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body:JSON.stringify(formData) }).then((res)=>{return res.json()}).then((data)=>{ console.log(data); if (data.foodname) { setMessage("Food Found") } else { setMessage('Wrong Credentials!') } }) } useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`/api/foodsearch/${food}`).then((res)=>{return res.json()}).then((data)=>{ setFood(data) }) },[]) return ( <>

Search To know the nurtients

{handleform(e)}}> {setFoodName(e.target.value)}} className='form-control'/>

) } export default NutriSearch
